data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 12957
data.actual_result: the video plays on its own even though you already paused it
data.expected_result: the youtube videos should stay paused and not randomly play on their own again
data.short_description: when you scroll up in discord server after playing and pausing youtube videos, they all play at once
data.steps_to_repro: - have a discord server with many messages to scroll up - have youtube videos somewhere in there - play and pause a bunch of them - scroll up a lot - all the youtube videos play at once after certain amount of scrolling
